once upon a time they lived a selfish
and shifty Fox in the forest because he
was always after something shifty not
only animals trusted this Fox nobody
made friends with him after a while
having no friends
the Fox moved to a cave in the mountain
next to the forest
one day flying from the cold parts of
the world a stalk came by the Fox was
very happy that he finally found a
friend he immediately went next to the
stalk
welcome my dear stork do you want to be
friends sure let's you're the shifty Fox
now can I trust you
of course you can I have no friends here
but I think that we can be best friends
after a short while bored of eating
alone
the Fox invited his new neighbor talked
to dinner happy about this invitation
the stork went joyfully to the fox's
house
the soup that the Fox had prepared
smelled delicious
preparing the table
the Fox poured the suit in large bowls
the stalk set down on the table and the
Fox set right across her bone Appetit I
hope you like my soup
the Fox was enjoying his soup from the
bowl but the stalk could not figure out
how to eat it from this large bowl
although she could put her big into the
bowl
she could only get one or two pieces of
rice at the time the stroke had only a
couple of rice pieces the Fox had
finished his Lu thinking that the Fox
was very unthoughtful the stalk was very
upset with him
but because she was the guest she stayed
quiet I should be going my friend thank
you for dinner but you haven't even
finished didn't you like it
never mind I'll eat yours to you as the
stroke was leaving the Fox had already

sadly went home she could not sleep all

very mad at her friend we are two
different animals the Fox needs to
understand and accept this but how after
putting some thought into it the stork
had an idea she was going to teach the
Fox that good lesson in the morning she
approached her friend with great

the folks of course was very happy for
his invitation thank you very much
neighbor I'm so glad we're friends
after preparing the food the stork
selected a long and narrow bottle for

after a short while the Fox arrived I'm
very hungry my friend let's sit and

the Fox tried to eat from the narrow

and seeing how stunned the Fox was she
asked ah my dear friend you're not
eating didn't you like it
if I could eat it maybe I would this
bottle is not for me
with your long beat you can easily get
your food but with my mouth I can't the

dear friend do you remember that I left

because you had used bowls on the table
which weren't suitable for me
suddenly the Fox realized his mistake he
was really sad that he put those large
bowls in front of his friend the store I
am really sorry my friend I could not
think that you would not be able to eat
from those balls it's okay dear Fox at
least now you understand me
we have to learn to respect each other's
differences
after this the stork brought a large
plate from which the Fox could eat
easily
and put his food on it the Fox enjoyed
finishing his food when it was time to
leave the Fox had an idea
hey stork let me take one of your
bottles home so when you come to here
with me you can eat your food easily
from that narrow bottle they don't call

use your mind and shiftiness for good
things like this you and your friends

being left alone the Fox returned to the
